content:
I just caught a paper plane with my insect net,
When I unfolded it, I found a toy design blueprint,
Written in rather crooked handwriting.
info: 幻雪关于纸飞机闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Say, do you think Paper Planes flying in the sky
might collide with little birds?
<size=30>Perhaps I should catch them all in my net to be safe.</size>
info: 幻雪关于纸飞机闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I tried chasing after a paper plane just now,
Watching it spiral, dancing between presence and absence,
Until it gradually drifted into the distance...
info: 幻雪关于纸飞机闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
"Sending thoughts through objects... letting the wind carry our feelings onwards..."
Paper Planes are popular in many places,
They say they can deliver good fortune and bring blessings.
info: 幻雪关于纸飞机闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
What piques my curiosity is,
when did such rumors
begin to spread, I wonder...
info: 幻雪关于纸飞机闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Like every precious thing in life that's destined to be lost.
......
<size=30>Mainly because my insect net just happened to break.</size>
info: 幻雪关于纸飞机闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I'm listening to the wind,
Hmm... There's a subtle change in the air currents,
And... the whooshing sound of Paper Planes!
info: 幻雪关于纸飞机闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Yip~ Here's an insect net for you,
And an insect net for me,
Let's see who can catch more Paper Planes!
info: 幻雪关于纸飞机闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
